pageContext.claim: “Report out that Obama Campaign paid $972,000 to Fusion GPS. The firm also got $12,400,000 (really?) from DNC!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump gets this completely mixed up. Perkins Coie, a law firm that worked for both the Democratic National Committee and the Clinton campaign, hired Fusion GPS. The Obama campaign also hired Perkins Coie. But that did not translate into all funding for the law firm equaling funds for Fusion GPS -- or that the Obama campaign had any connection to Fusion.
